roleset.name: cause diffraction
roleset.note: DIFFRACT-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from diffract.01-v)

example.name: Active
example.text: A long slit of infinitesimal width which is illuminated by light diffracts thelight into a series of circular waves.
example.arg: A long slit of infinitesimal width which is illuminated by light
into a series of circular waves
